sceneDescription.title: The Hispaniola Sets Sail from Bristol

characters.appearance: Ship's captain, 45, stern expression, weathered features
characters.clothing: Naval coat with brass buttons, tricorn hat
New sailor's outfit, slightly too large

scene.mainElements: Three-masted schooner leaving busy harbor at sunrise, crew working to set sails as adventure begins
scene.details: Complex rigging with sailors climbing like spiders, white sails catching golden dawn light, wooden deck scrubbed clean, coiled ropes, brass fittings gleaming, seagulls wheeling overhead, other ships at anchor, Bristol's buildings shrinking in distance
scene.background: Bristol harbor with forest of masts, city skyline in morning mist
scene.atmosphere: Exhilarating departure, fresh start, mixture of excitement and apprehension, dawn of adventure

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot from stern showing full ship and harbor
composition.focus: The ship cutting through harbor waters
composition.depth: Ship's deck and rigging in foreground, harbor waters middle ground, Bristol fading into misty background
